full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MAndAL GYI DMIGS RIM GSAL BAR STON PA PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES MAndAL GYI DMIGS RIM GSAL BAR STON PA PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD STOBS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA SKYID GROD RDZONG BZHUGS, CHE BA SDE BA TSE DBANG NGAG SPOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,) @013B `RNAM 'DREN BZHI PA'I ZHAL PAD LAS, ,GSUNGS PA'I MDO SNGAGS GNAD DON KUN, ,GLING 'DIR NYI LTAR GSAL MDZAD PA'I, ,BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHABS LA 'DUD, ,SKYES CHEN DAM PA'I LEGS GSUNGS PA'I, ,MAndAL DMIGS RIM GSAL BAR STON, ,PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES GRAGS 'DI, ,GZHAN RNAMS 'DI DANG MTHUN SPYOD DANG, RANG NYID BYANG CHUB MA THOB PAR, ,RNAL 'BYOR RTEN THOB 'DI NYID DANG, ,MTHUN PAR SBYOR SNYAM SMON @014A *, ,SEMS KYIS, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SMON LAM GYIS, ,CHOS SBYIN SPEL PHYIR PAR BSGRUBS DGES, ,'DI YI KHUR LEN YIG MKHAN SOGS, ,CHOS MTHUN RNAMS KYI BSAM DON 'GRUB, ,BSHAD SGRUB BYA BA RGYAS GYUR CIG ,BIKshU RGAN PA'I RE SKONG PHYIR, ,DGE SLONG DRUNG YIG GDUGS KYI MING, ,RANG NYID RTZOM PA'I BAG CHAGS 'JOG ,PAR BYANG BSDEBS PAS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
